ch.epfl.lis.gnw
Class GraphUtilities

java.lang.Object
  ch.epfl.lis.gnw.GraphUtilities

public class GraphUtilities
extends java.lang.Object

Implements some functions to analyze structural properties of networks.

Author:
Daniel Marbach (firstname.name@gmail.com)

Method Summary
 void anonymizeGenes()
          Replace the true names of the genes by G1, G2, ..., and save the mapping: G1 "true name of gene 1" G2 "true name of gene 2" etc.

 java.util.ArrayList<int[]> getSortedCoregulatorPairs()
          Evaluate for every pair of regulators the number of targets that they have in common, return the sorted list of pairs (only include those that do have common targets)

Constructor Detail

GraphUtilities

public GraphUtilities(ch.epfl.lis.imod.ImodNetwork network)
Constructor

Method Detail

getAdjacencyMatrix

public boolean[][] getAdjacencyMatrix()
Return the adjacency matrix A of the network. A[i][j] = true if there is a link from gene *j* to gene i.

getIndegrees

public int[] getIndegrees()
Return the indegrees (number of inputs) of the nodes

getOutdegrees

public int[] getOutdegrees()
Return the outdegrees (number of outputs) of the nodes

getStronglyConnectedComponents

public java.util.ArrayList<java.util.ArrayList<ch.epfl.lis.networks.Node>> getStronglyConnectedComponents()
Returns the strongly connected components of the graph (network)

getSortedCoregulatorPairs

public java.util.ArrayList<int[]> getSortedCoregulatorPairs()
Evaluate for every pair of regulators the number of targets that they have in common, return the sorted list of pairs (only include those that do have common targets)

anonymizeGenes

public void anonymizeGenes()
Replace the true names of the genes by G1, G2, ..., and save the mapping: G1 "true name of gene 1" G2 "true name of gene 2" etc.

setNetwork

public void setNetwork(ch.epfl.lis.imod.ImodNetwork network)
